title: 96x17: Relationship among 5 U.S.C. § 3110, 18 U.S.C. § 208, and E.O. 12674
summary: Section 101 (h) and (n) of E.O. 12674 does not conflict with 5 U.S.C. § 3110 (the nepotism statute) or 18 U.S.C. § 208. Spouses could work in the same office, but one spouse could not hire the other spouse to work there, or even recommend the other spouse for promotion.
